Title: [The Let Them Theory: A Life-Changing Tool That Millions of People Can’t Stop Talking About](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9781401971366) (Hardcover)
Author: Mel Robbins
Synopsis: Two simple words—Let Them—will set you free. Free from the opinions, drama, and judgments of others. Free from the exhausting cycle of trying to manage everything and everyone around you. The Let Them Theory puts the power to create a life you love back in your hands—and this book will show you exactly how to do it.
